channel.title: Projects on Hamza
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Hamza

item.title: Project 2: My Linkedin Profile Insights
item.description: Extracted data from my Linkedin Profile and made a dashboard in Tableau. Highlighted which companies most of my connections work in and what their job titles are. Also showed the year over year growth of my connections. Tools used: Microsoft Excel and Tableau Dashboard: https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/hamza.ahmed4618/viz/MyLinkedinProfileInsights/Dashboard1

item.title: Project 1: Forecast of Percent Population Infected with Covid
item.description: Made a dashboard that uses past data to forecast what percentage of country population will be infected by Covid-19 in 2023. Tools used: Excel, Microsoft SQL Server, Tableau Dashboard: https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/hamza.ahmed4618/viz/CovidDashboard_16596506467250/Dashboard1 SQL code: https://github.com/Hamza367/PortfolioProjects/blob/main/COVID_Portfolio_Project.sql Data source: https://ourworldindata.org/covid-deaths
